text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Glad you’re not politicizing your coronavirus briefings by bringing up, say, gun issues in Va., or how the world would have ended in war with Korea if you hadn’t been elected. PS Is your reading disability the root of your anger & inferiority issues? #RUDEandNASTY
